alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 4:47AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bibb, Monroe, eastern Upson, Crawford, southwestern Jones, southeastern Talbot, northern Taylor and southeastern Lamar Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 447 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Musella, or near Roberta, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Forsyth, Roberta, Yatesville, Payne, Junction City, Culloden, Payne City, Lake Tobesofkee, Russellville, Wesleyan, Logtown, Howard, Skipperton, Arkwright, Salem, Prattsburg, Horns, Wesley Church and Fickling Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Taylor; Upson
